#VT100 TERMINAL

[![PkgGoDev](https://pkg.go.dev/badge/github.com/navidys/vtterm)](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/navidys/vtterm)
[![Go Report](https://goreportcard.com/badge/github.com/navidys/vtterm)](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/navidys/vtterm)

This is a vt100 screen reader ( clone of [jaguilar/v100](https://github.com/jaguilar/vt100) ) and includes some extra feature e.g. scroll down
